headline: CenterPoint Energy remains vigilant and continues to assess progress of Invest 93L in northeastern Gulf
summary: CenterPoint Energy's Meteorology, Emergency Planning & Response, and Electric Operations teams continue to remain vigilant and track the low-pressure system designated as Invest 93L as it moves along the coast of the Florida Panhandle.

raw.headline: CenterPoint Energy remains vigilant and continues to assess progress of Invest 93L in northeastern Gulf
raw.summary: CenterPoint Energy's Meteorology, Emergency Planning & Response, and Electric Operations teams continue to remain vigilant and track the low-pressure system designated as Invest 93L as it moves along the coast of the Florida Panhandle.

headline: Southern Company's Power Plan Gets a Nod to Meet Surging AI Demand
summary: SO's forward-looking power plan gets approval from the Georgia regulator to expand capacity, enhance reliability and boost renewables amid AI growth drive.

raw.headline: Southern Company's Power Plan Gets a Nod to Meet Surging AI Demand
raw.summary: SO's forward-looking power plan gets approval from the Georgia regulator to expand capacity, enhance reliability and boost renewables amid AI growth drive.
